exclusion.criterion: previous diagnosis of OSA or had been exposed to CPAP therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: valvular or congenital cardiopathy, unstable angina, acute myocardial infarction or cardiac surgery in the three months prior to enrolment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
